name: Tidy Hidey
description:
Home means your Mom makes you do chores! 💚

Tidy Hidey is the ultimate home simulation experience where you roleplay as a young college student stuck at home. Mom went out to buy groceries and left you with the task of cleaning the house. Ever the responsible child, you forget about it and fall asleep 😪😴 Now you only have mere minutes left until Mom comes home!!!

With your trusty broom, zip around the house and make everything sparkle! But be quick or dirt will accumulate again on places you've cleaned. Feel the dread as more chores pop up as you finish them. Be sure you're either hidden or have the house clean before Mom arrives, or else you're in for a beating 😈

Disclaimer: This game doesn't have stealth mechanics so do your chores!

Developers:

BUHION, Deborah - https://itch.io/profile/drbuhion

DIZON, Michaela - https://itch.io/profile/michaeladizon
